DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of brimonidine tartrate 0.025% ophthalmic solution used four times daily in a population of adult and geriatric subjects
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution in Adult and Geriatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Be at least 40 years of age Must have normal ocular health Must have history of redness relief drop use or desire to use Must not have any ocular/systemic health problems Must agree to avoid disallowed medications
